pageTitle: Peter Kirkman | Fund Manager Fact Sheet | JP Morgan Asset Management | Citywire
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5504=2015, 4006=February 2003 - Starts managing first fund, 9860=2013, 12042=2012, 17673=Peter Kirkman was born in Nottingham in 1969 and graduated from the University of East Anglia with a BSc in accountancy, also has an M.Phil in management studies from Cambridge University. He joined JP Morgan Asset Management in 2001 where he is a portfolio manager in the global equities team based in New York. Prior to this he was a senior portfolio manager of Japanese equities at Trust Company of the West in London and a portfolio manager at Prudential. Peter has been managing funds for over 18 years and holds a Cerificate in Investment Management from the London Business School. He is an associate member of the UK Society of Investment Professionals (ASIP) and a member of the CFA Institute., 14298=2011, 7682=2014}
